header.title: Matthew Millar | Software Engineer
header.description: Your concise and compelling summary goes here. This is an example meta description for a web page.

blocks.body: I'm Matt, a passionate software engineer with a love for crafting innovative solutions. With a background in [mention your relevant expertise or technologies], I thrive on turning ideas into reality through clean and efficient code.
Explore my projects, read my thoughts on the latest tech trends, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions or collaboration opportunities.

The background imagery on this website is generated using a model of computation known as Cellular Automata, in particular the one-dimensional automata defined by Stephen Wolfram in his Wolfram Code numbering system. If you hit the Animate button in the top right of your screen (Desktop only), the automata will generate on the fly using a randonly selected rule. I also had a go at rendering it in 3D using Three.js here.

Researchers find Cellular Automata interesting due to their capacity to exhibit complex and unpredictable behavior emerging from simple rules. They also look pretty cool right! The rules I used are decribed here pretty well if you're interested in giving it a go yourself.
You can see my code here
